title: That's Mean!
description: That's Mean! includes such no-no's as scaring your little sister, telling secrets, and spitting on people, all delightfully illustrated and sure to delight kids three years and up. Kicking the cat... That's Mean!This kid-approved book takes a humorous look at all things mean and nasty. Firmly focused on fun, That's Mean! is the perfect opportunity to have a teachable moment with your young reader, all while making them laugh.
author: Francesco Pittau
